products.name: IC Socket
products.description: A durable IC socket designed to securely hold dual in-line package (DIP) integrated circuits. It allows for easy replacement and testing of ICs without soldering, making it ideal for prototyping and repair work.

products.name: 8-bit Microcontrollers IC
products.description: A powerful 8-bit microcontroller widely used in embedded systems, featuring built-in peripherals and programmable flash memory. Ideal for robotics, IoT, and automation projects.

products.name: Audio IC
products.description: This audio IC module delivers amplified stereo sound output. It is perfect for hobby audio projects, intercoms, and small speaker setups. Designed for efficiency and simplicity.

products.name: Buffers & Transceivers IC
products.description: High-speed buffer/transceiver IC that facilitates reliable communication between devices in bus-based systems. Ensures data integrity with low propagation delay.

products.name: Drivers & Interfaces IC
productDetail: Seven Darlington arrays in one package
products.description: Versatile IC used for interfacing microcontrollers with higher power loads such as motors, relays, and lamps. Offers high current and voltage handling with built-in freewheeling diodes.

products.name: Frequency Management
products.description: A precision frequency management IC for generating stable clock signals. Suitable for use in microcontrollers, FPGAs, and timing-sensitive applications.

products.name: Linear voltage regulator
products.description: A reliable linear voltage regulator providing consistent 5V output, ideal for powering sensitive analog and digital circuits. Protects against overcurrent and overheating.

products.name: Logic IC
products.description: Basic NAND logic IC used in digital circuits. Provides fast switching and consistent logic output for building complex logic gates and systems.

products.name: Mux & Demux IC
products.description: Multiplexer and demultiplexer IC designed for efficient signal selection and routing in digital circuits. Ideal for memory addressing and switching applications.

products.name: Power management IC
products.description: Compact IC designed to manage power distribution in electronic circuits. Ensures stable operation of devices with protection against overvoltage and overheating.
